## CRYPTO

### FUNNY

​![iUVtPu9XwbJpsE6](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Wh1teJ0ker/PicGo/main/Pic/net-img-iUVtPu9XwbJpsE6-20240826135314-m44ok7e.png)​

### REAL\_SIGN\_IN

低指数加密广播攻击

```python
from Crypto.Util.number import *
from gmpy2 import *
e = 65537
n1 = 
c1 = 
n2 = 
c2 = 
n3 = 
c3 = 
n4 = 
c4 = 
n5 = 
c5 = 
n6 = 
c6 = 
n7 = 
c7 = 
n8 = 
c8 = 
n9 = 
c9 = 
n10 = 
c10 = 
n11 = 
c11 = 
for i in range(1, 11):
    for j in range(i + 1, 11):
        ni = eval("n" + str(i))
        nj = eval("n" + str(j))
        p = gcd(ni, nj)
        if p > 1:
            c = eval("c" + str(i))
            q = ni // p
            d = invert(e, (p - 1) * (q - 1))
            flag = long_to_bytes(pow(c, d, ni))
            print(flag)
```

### SIGN\_IN

[2021-07-06_pow(m + getprime(10), dp, r1 ](https://blog.csdn.net/qq_53283643/article/details/118518486) *[p), pow(m, dq, r2](https://blog.csdn.net/qq_53283643/article/details/118518486)* [-CSDN博客](https://blog.csdn.net/qq_53283643/article/details/118518486)

```python
from Crypto.Util.number import *
from gmpy2 import *

def decrypt(c1, c2):
    xp = c1 % p
    xq = c2 % q
    # Chinese Remainder Theorem
    m = (xp*inverse(q, p)*q + xq*inverse(p, q)*p) % N
    return m

N = 
g1 = 
g2 = 

c1, c2 = (, )

p=gcd(N,g1-1)
q=gcd(N,g2-1)
m=decrypt(c1,c2)
print(long_to_bytes(m))
```

### MIXED

边做边学

[数论推导题_东华杯fermat&apos;s revenge-CSDN博客](https://blog.csdn.net/XiongSiqi_blog/article/details/130175464)

[[NSSCTF 2nd]Math-CSDN博客https://blog.csdn.net/shshss64/article/details/133917577](https://blog.csdn.net/shshss64/article/details/133917577))

```python
import gmpy2
from Crypto.Util.number import *
e = 65537
n1 = 
n2 = 
c = 
h0 = 
h1 = 
h2 = 

x1 = pow(h1 * pow(2023, 114, n1),514,n1) % n1
x2 = pow(h2 * pow(2024, 514, n1),114,n1) % n1
q = gmpy2.gcd(n1, x1 - x2)
p1 = n1 // q
p = GCD(pow(2024,n2,n2) - h0,n2)
q1 = n2 // p
n = p * q
phi = (p - 1)*(q - 1)
d = gmpy2.invert(e,phi)
m = pow(c,d,n)
print(long_to_bytes(m))
```

## WEB

### PWD

```php
<?php
error_reporting(0);
highlight_file(__FILE__);
$con = mysqli_connect("localhost","root","root","ccut");
function waffff($sql) {
    if (preg_match("/infor|sys|sql|thread|case|when|if|like|left|right|mid|cmp|sub|locate|position|match|find|field|sleep|repeat|lock|bench|process|<|>|=|xor|and|&&|\\\\/i", $sql)) {
        die("hacker");
    }
}
if (isset($_POST['password'])) {
    $password = $_POST['password'];
    waffff($password);
    $sql = "SELECT password FROM users WHERE username='admin' and password='$password'";
    $user_result = mysqli_query($con,$sql);
    $row = mysqli_fetch_array($user_result);
    if ($row['password'] === $password) {
        include "/flag";
    } else {
        echo "error";
    }
}
```

一个Quine注入，详细看链接，类似第五空间的题

[SQL注入之Quine注入-腾讯云开发者社区-腾讯云 (tencent.com)](https://cloud.tencent.com/developer/article/2287111)

### SIGN\_IN

​![PsO7jzpcSMdYu53](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Wh1teJ0ker/PicGo/main/Pic/net-img-PsO7jzpcSMdYu53-20240826135319-8xuvr45.png)​

首先发现存在两张jpg图片，分离后得到密钥HAPPY\_NEW\_YEAR

然后通过密钥发现存在outguess隐写
